author: sky.cactus
content: Noob question.  Is there a hard guarantee that for every ECDSA public key there is exactly one private key?

author: sky.cactus
content: Or perhaps more generally (I think, please correct me if this question doesn't make sense), is it guaranteed that for a given elliptic curve, for each point Q, there exists only one point P that can be multiplied by the field size to reach that Q?

author: dsy4312
content: Does anyone know what other blockchains exist out there that support contracts, but not from some version of the EVM?
